issue.title: SHOP, user is notified for every product
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

In SHOP if user has multiple product, he is notified for each product.
In V2, the user was only notified for the first product processed, and for the last (order completed).
This is a problem if the user has a lot of products in an order. (We have orders with 30 products or more !)

In V2 there was a field in DB to check if user has been notified once, I propose to re-implement the same way.

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0
